tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I went to many dentists to retain my original teeth but got a negative solution as I have very small mouth opening. His gentle treatment fixed my teeth without hassle.   

He also makes use of the latest technology to enhance his  treatment. I will highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Pankaj Rooprai is a blessed Doctor and has magic in his hands. He treated my concern very well and is expert in his profession. I am willing to travel extra 15kms to visit him than showing to a local Doctor

Must recommended for anybody looking for Dental solutions

Really thankful to Dr Pankaj for taking so good care of my father's all dental issues, since last 5 years. His professional competence is par excellence, but more than that his humane approach & very friendly demeanour is icing on the cake. Very highly recommended. ðŸ˜Š

review: I took wife sangeeta.The doc suggested RCT.the process was smooth. Very less pain.Friendly doc and good ambience. Easily located with parking. MUST visit.
Good doctor with very good behaviour and suggestion. My child also happy with his attitude and friendly behaviour.
